page.title: 19The Church in Fraserburgh
page.content: The original{Old Parish Church, Saltoun Square, was built{1571.}The present building was erected on the same site in 1803 and has been extensively altered inside and out since then. The minister is the {Rev.D.Clyne}who is also the{school {chaplain}for Fraserburgh Academy. The{Rev.Charles Ferme}was minister in{1598}when he was appointed {Principal}of the{University of {Fraserburgh,}which sadly only lasted a short time. The town has churches, meeting halls and missions of some{12 churches and {denominations}which are well supported by their congregations.
